long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Email & Phone Number Finder for Chrome
Effortlessly find email addresses and phone numbers from any webpage with just one click.
With a single click on the Chrome icon, instantly find all the email addresses and phone numbers available on the webpage you're visiting. The extension automatically displays the data in a clear, easy-to-read list format.
★ One-Click Copy
Select any email or phone number from the list and copy it directly to your clipboard with one click. A checkmark emoji appears briefly next to copied items as visual feedback, confirming the action was successful.
★ Fast & Efficient
This tool is designed to help marketers, salespeople, and researchers gather contact information quickly, without manually searching and copying from web pages.
★ Seamless Workflow
Perfect for professionals who need to compile contact lists from multiple websites. Save time, stay organised, and ensure you never miss a contact opportunity again.
★ Get Started
Download the extension and start finding email addresses and phone numbers immediately. No sign-up required! Simplify your data collection process today.
